defs: the first letter and the first vowel of the Kannaḍa alphabet;
ಅ ಆ ಬಾರದಿದ್ದರೂ ಅಮರವಾದರೂ ಹೇಳು aā bāradiddarū amaravādarū heḷu (prov.) even the illiterate must know the lexicon.
the first of the three syllables that make the sacred compound-syllable 'ಓಂ'.
an indeclinable used as an end termination to show report or tradition - 'as they say', 'as reported', 'is it not'.
an indeclinable termination to verbs to add politeness in addressing (ನೋಡು>ನೋಡ, ನೋಡಾ) the second person in singular number.
an indeclinable to verbs to make it interrogative.
a termination to nouns or pronouns to express them in possessive case (the sixth case in Kannaḍa grammar).
a particle, used at the end, to form personal nouns while compounding (as ಅಯ್ಸರಳು >ಅಯ್ಸರಳ, ಕಾರೊಡಲ).
a prefix, corresponding to 'in' or 'un' of English, used as a negative particle to mean (a) 'negation', 'absence', (b) distinction, difference, (c) 'bad', 'unfit', (d) 'opposition'.
a termination of the infinitive (as in ಎಸಗು+ಅ=ಎಸಗ for ಎಸಗಲು).
a termination of the third person in the neuter of the negative (as in ಸಲ್ಲ=ಸಲ್ಲದು).
any of the Hindu trinity, Brahma, Viṣṇu and Śiva.
= ಅ ಆ ಇ ಈ.
an interjection for expressing grief, pain, etc.
(pl.) the alphabets.
the primary knowledge of a subject; the rudiments.
a conjunctional suffix, affixed to the end of each word to be connected in a sentence.
a rod of metal or wood bent sharply backward at one end, to catch or hold an object; a hook.
an instrument or a weapon having a hook-end.
the state of being bent or crooked; a bend; crookedness.
a support for a horse-rider's foot; stirrup.
a device consisting of a bar turning about a fixed point, the fulcrum, using power or force applied at a second point to lift or sustain a weight at a third point; a lever.
the fold of the body of a person sitting; the lap.
the side of an animal (from the ribs to the thigh) or of anything; flank.
the whole physical frame of a person or an animal; the body.
a long mark having no breadth or thickness, connecting to different points on the same plane; a line.
a charecter representing, in writing, a number; a figure.
a visual indication; a mark; a sign, symbol or token.
a mark or a spot made by the drop of wet matter; hence, (fig.) a mark of infamy; stigma; a stain.
that by which a person or thing is called or known; a name.
an appellation attached to one's name as a mark of distinction; a title.
widespread high estimation; renown; fame.
a distinctive section of a play; an act.
one of the ten varieties of dramatic composition.
a physical combat between two opposing persons or armies; a wrestling or battle.
a professional wrestler.
a contention, in rivalry or to excel another; a competition; vying.
the number nine, and the figure representing the number nine.
a certain portion, either marked or not, on a surface or within an enclosed building etc.
the god of the firmament and of rain; Indra.
the inner portion of anything or inner space.
that which has comparatively been longer in existence; that which belongs to older times.
uprightness in ethical and social behaviour; rectitude; righteousness.
the sense that a word is meant to carry; meaning.
a limited extent in one, two or three dimensions; space.
a violent mental struggle; the state of grievous distress; agony; anguish.
that which is variegated with different colours and designs (usu. dif. from its natural state).
the state of being variegated; variegation.
the narrowest beam of light; a ray.
an act of enhancing the beauty or of adding colour or ornament for a better appearance; decoration.
an ornament used to add grace or beauty.
the chiming sound of bells or produced by beating small drums.
a point awarded for merit; a mark.
a religious offence or irregularity; sin.
an act that is wrong from the point of view of ethics, social customs or law; a crime; an offence.
a mountain.
the state and fact of being; existence.
brightness, as in reflected light or luster emanated from within;

ಕಡೆಯ ಅಂಕ kaḍeya aŋka (fig.) the last stage in one's life, reign, etc.; ಅಂಕದವ(ನು) aŋkadava(nu) a man who protects the body of another; a bodyguard; ಅಂಕದವಳು aŋkadavaḷu a woman who protects the body of another; a (female) bodyguard; ಅಂಕದ ಪರದೆ ಏಳು aŋkada parade ēḷu (the performance of a dramatic act, an event) to start (as on the stage); ಅಂಕದ ಪರದೆ ಬೀಳು aŋkada parade bīḷu (an event, etc.) to come to an end; ಅಂಕ ಮುಗಿ aŋka mugi (an event, etc.) to come to an end; ಅಂಕವಾಗು aŋkavāgu (a war) to happen; to befall.

the act of taking other person into arms and press to the bosom with affection; an embracing.
